settings.title: Introducing the Hall of Fame of Hair Heroes:
settings.text:
SHEA BUTTER' mmm butter. Shea rs your scalp healer protector'. and is packed with anti-inflammatory properties to help with dry. damaged scalps. Don't be fooled by the 'butter' bit though:Ns nourishing ingredient won't be blocking your pores or leaving you fooling greasy. Rest ensured knowing you're giving your scalp good lovire with thin vitamin A and E. essential fatty acid-filled angel.

FLAXSEED OIL: Imagine If your hair had the flexibility& an olympic gymnast.Imagine no more. Flaxseed orl is a rich source of vitamin E. BE B2 (heh. now Mt picturing Bananas in PyArmis). B6 and biotin - basically the A.squad in elasticity. Your heir will be bending over backwards (sans breakages) in no time.

KAKADU PLUM: need moisture and hydration? Better invite kakadu plum to the party then. Kakadu plus wit brig elastin and collagen as es (who rocks up to a
party empty handed? Not KP). At the end of the night (or your shower). your hair will go from dry and lifeless to totally cranking the volume and shining like a disco bail. Yup, definitely inviting kakadu plum

HYDROLYSED OUINOA: quinoa Isn't just for your sal adl Ou inoa is a protein-rich seed that looooooves hair. Its been used throughout history (like. ancient hmes) for it's hair
